description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the SAP Business. Service  contract for a Case Management Platform(CMP) in support of its Digital Platform. full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Title (English)**: Bid Solicitation for a Case Management Platform (CMP)

**Title (French)**: Demande de soumissions pour un Plateforme de gestion de cas (PGC)

**Reference Number**: WS3228586309

**Bid Opportunity ID Number**: WS3228586309

**Date of Publication**: March 20, 2024

**Closing Date**: May 13, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT

This tender solicitation is issued as a request for proposal (RFP) pursuant to Canada's procurement processes. The purpose of this RFP is to solicit proposals from qualified suppliers to provide a case management platform in support of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada's (IRCC) Digital Platform Modernization (DPM) program.

**Background**

The IRCC requires a case management platform to support its digital platform modernization program. This platform will be used to manage immigration cases and provide a secure and efficient way of processing applications.

**Bid Requirements**

The successful bidder will be required to provide a secure service, configure and implement the CMP into production, and provide an enterprise data platform (EDP).

**Notice**

Amendments have been made to the closing date of this bid solicitation. Please disregard the SAP Business Network posting response closing time and the CanadaBuys posting closing time. All responses must be submitted by May 13, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.

**Procurement Details**

* **Classification**: Software or hardware engineering (UNSPSC 81111500)
* **Procurement Category**:  Service (SRV) Procurement
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Governing Agreement**: Qualified Supplier Partnerships (QSPs) under ITQ#B9220-220012

**Contact Information**

* Contracting Authority: Cardinal, France (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: france.cardinal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Telephone: Not provided
* Fax: Not provided
* Address: Not provided

**Important Notice**

It is the responsibility of the bidder to ensure that all responses are submitted on time. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

This tender solicitation is only open to qualified supplier partnerships (QSPs) that remain qualified under ITQ#B9220-220012.

**Additional Information**

All inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority
